testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on SaveAndAlerts for localization

substeps.message: Username: pushpendra.kumarjha@clarivate.com, Password: Cortellis@4321
Logged in with user: 'pushpendra.kumarjha@clarivate.com

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese
I perform Search using term "cancer"
I click on SaveAndAlerts link in search result

substeps.message: Save And Alerts pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

steps.title: I Verify Chinese at "SaveAndAlerts" page

substeps.message: On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'Save & Alerts Title' with the key 'qsearch.save.search.or.alert' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?????/??? and the Content displayed on UI SAVE SEARCH AND/OR ALERT are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'Save & Alerts Description' with the key 'qsearch.choose.save.or.alert' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???????????????? (?????) ??????????????????????????????????? and the Content displayed on UI Choose if you would like to save the search query or reports, create an alert, or save and alert combined; based on the search query (including filters) or reports in the results list are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'cpgsavereportview.save_search_query' with the key 'cpgsavereportview.save_search_query' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ????? and the Content displayed on UI Save Search Query are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'cpgsavereportview.alert_on_search_query' with the key 'cpgsavereportview.alert_on_search_query' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ????? and the Content displayed on UI Alert on Search Query are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'qsearch.save.and.alert.on.saerch.query' with the key 'qsearch.save.and.alert.on.saerch.query' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?????????? and the Content displayed on UI Save and Alert on Search Query are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'cpgsavereportview.save_reports' with the key 'cpgsavereportview.save_reports' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Save Report(s) are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'qsearch.save.on.reports' with the key 'qsearch.save.on.reports' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Alert on Report(s) are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'qsearch.save.and.alert.on.reports' with the key 'qsearch.save.and.alert.on.reports' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ????????? and the Content displayed on UI Save and Alert on Report(s) are NOT matching

On 'SaveAndAlerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'modalquickfix.cancel' with the key 'modalquickfix.cancel' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Cancel are NOT matching
